column5: When do you guys think there will be ice on Simcoe? Thanks
cooks bay before the new year 2nd week of jan for the big lake
the next 14 days looks good. Not for ice though. It'll cool it down quick.  .....it's a start...  http://www.accuweather.com/canada-forecast...ic=1&set=99
Some FINE Muskie weather there my friend...

I'm with Terry for 2nd week of Jan. on the big lake.  I was on 4 inches of very fresh ice at BBP last year on Jan. 9th...this year is a little bit behind, but hopefully by the new year, we'll have had enough cold weather to close the gap.
Looks Like the temps are going to go down, maybe be on the lake in a couple weeks.
Water is still 42/44 F as of 5pm on Georgian Bay. Suspect Simcoe is similar..
Yep..so about the same.. GBay was 45.7F last Saturday
